attributes.action: Stop the rollout of vaccinations for children under 18
attributes.additional_details: You have a duty of care toward the people of this land. Your own committee does not support vaccinating children.
attributes.background:
The JCVI does not recommend vaccinating children under 16 against Sars-Cov-2.
There is zero medical evidence to support the vaccination of children

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Do not vaccinate children against COVID-19 until Phase 3 trials are complete
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586017
